title: Derive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from Meredith's Second CO Axiom

blocks.name: merco2
blocks.content: A single axiom for propositional calculus discovered by C. A. Meredith. This axiom has 19 symbols, sans auxiliaries. See notes in ~ merco1 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 7-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm merco2(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5) {
  |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(wi(w3, w0), wi(w4, wi(w5, w0))))
} = {
  com4l(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(w3, w0), w4, w5, w0)
  a1i(w5, wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(wi(w3, w0), wi(w4, w0))))
  a1dd(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(w3, w0), w4, w0)
  3syl(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(wi(w3, w0), w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), wi(wi(w0, w3), w3))
  mpi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w3)), wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), wi(wfal, w2))
  falim(w2)
  pm2.04(wi(w0, w1), wi(wfal, w2), w3)
  jad(wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), w0, w3, w3)
  jarl(w0, w1, w3)
  idd(wi(wi(w0, w1), w3), w3)
  looinv(w0, w3)
}

blocks.name: mercolem1
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mercolem1(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
  merco2(w0, w0, w0, w0, w0, w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))))
  merco2(w2, w0, w0, wi(w0, w1), w1, w3)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))))), wi(wi(wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wfal)), wi(wi(wfal, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)))))
  merco2(w1, wi(w3, w2), w0, wfal, wi(wfal, w0), w0)
  merco2(wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wfal), w1, wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), w2))
  merco2(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2)), w0, wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wfal, w0), wi(w2, w0))
  merco2(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w2), wi(w1, wi(w3, w2))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), w0, wi(wi(w2, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
}

blocks.name: mercolem2
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mercolem2(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
  merco2(w0, w0, w0, w0, w0, w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))))
  merco2(w0, w0, w0, wi(w0, w1), w2, w3)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wfal)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)))))
  merco2(w0, w1, w0, wfal, w2, w3)
  merco2(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wfal), w0, wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)), wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0))
  merco2(wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)), wi(w0, w1), w0, wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(w0, w1), w0))
  merco2(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0)), w0, wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w0))
  merco2(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), w0), wi(w2, wi(w3, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1)), w0, wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
}

blocks.name: mercolem3
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mercolem3(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
  merco2(w2, w2, w2, w2, w2, w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)))))
  merco2(w1, w2, w2, w0, w0, w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)), w0), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0))))
  mercolem2(w0, wi(w2, w1), wi(wfal, w2), wi(wfal, w2))
  merco2(wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)), w0, w2, wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0), wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w1))
  merco2(wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1)), w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wfal, w2), wi(w1, w2))
  merco2(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w2, w1))), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0), w2, wi(wi(w1, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
}

blocks.name: mercolem4
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mercolem4(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4) {
  |- wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
  merco2(w2, w2, w2, w2, w2, w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))))
  merco2(wi(w1, w2), w2, w2, w0, wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), w4)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0))), wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w3), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))))), wi(wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w3)), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w3)), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w3))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))))
  merco2(w2, w2, w2, wi(w0, w3), w4, w1)
  mercolem1(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w3)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2))), wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)))
  mercolem1(wi(wfal, w2), wi(w0, w3), wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), wi(wfal, w2))
  merco2(w0, w3, w2, wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wfal, w2))
  mercolem3(wi(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0), wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wfal, w2))
  merco2(wi(wi(w0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w3), w2), wi(w4, wi(w1, w2)))), w0, w2, wi(wi(wi(w1, w2), w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w0)), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w2), w2)), wi(wi(w2, w2), wi(w2, wi(w2, w2)))))
}

blocks.name: mercolem5
blocks.content: Used to rederive the Tarski-Bernays-Wajsberg axioms from ~ merco2 . (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm mercolem5(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, wi(w3, w1))))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, wi(w3, w1)))), wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w1), w1)), wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(w1, wi(w1, w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w1), w1)), wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(w1, wi(w1, w1)))), wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, wi(w3, w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(wi(wfal, w1), w1)), wi(wi(w1, w1), wi(w1, wi(w1, w1)))))
  merco2(w1, w1, w1, w1, w1, w1)

  mercolem7(w0, w1, w2, wi(wfal, w0))
  mercolem7(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(wi(w0, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1)), wi(wi(w1, wi(w0, w2)), wi(w3, wi(w4, wi(w0, w2)))), wi(wfal, w0))
  merco2(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(wi(w1, wi(w0, w2)), wi(w3, wi(w4, wi(w0, w2))))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1))), w0, wi(wi(wi(w0, w2), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w1)), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, wi(w0, w0)))))
}

blocks.name: re1tbw4
blocks.content: ~ tbw-ax4 rederived from ~ merco2 . This theorem, along with ~ re1tbw1 , ~ re1tbw2 , and ~ re1tbw3 , shows that ~ merco2 , along with ~ ax-mp , can be used as a complete axiomatization of propositional calculus. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 16-Aug-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm re1tbw4(wff w0) {
  |- wi(wfal, w0)
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w0))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(w0, w0))
  ax-mp(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), w0), w0))
  re1tbw3(w0, w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(w0, w0), w0), w0), wi(w0, w0)), wi(w0, wi(wi(w0, w0), w0)))
  re1tbw2(w0, wi(w0, w0))
  re1tbw1(w0, wi(wi(w0, w0), w0), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wfal, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0)))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wfal, w0)))
  re1tbw3(wi(wfal, w0), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0))), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0), wi(wfal, w0))))
  re1tbw2(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0))
  re1tbw1(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wfal, w0))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0)), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wi(w0, w0), wi(wfal, w0)))), wi(wi(wi(wfal, w0), w0), wi(wi(wfal, w0), wi(wfal, w0))))
  mercolem3(wi(wfal, w0), w0, wfal)
  merco2(wi(wfal, w0), w0, w0, wi(wfal, w0), wi(w0, w0), wi(w0, w0))
}
